name: Initial meeting with advisor
description: Discuss topics such as: curriculum plan, compliance, milestones for full time v. part time students, the handbook, DNP project ideas and processes, immersion focus and hours, and program trajectory.

name: One page executive summary
description: This should include a summary of immersion (clinical summary, setting, interests} and PICO-T question progress

name: PICO-T question
description: Synthesis and outcome tables, literature review, paragraph about intervention, best practice recommendation

name: Committee discussion with advisor and selection
Pre-Professional Exam meeting with full committee
description: a minimum of one formal meeting with your committee is strongly suggested. Atleast one month prior to exam

name: Final Professional Exam document sent to committee
Application for Professional Exam due in Gradforms
description: due in gradforms, need to be approved by advisor https://gradforms.osu.edu/ 2 weeks prior to exam

name: Discuss Manuscript vs. multiple document format with committee
description: committee members sign approval in the professional examination in Gradforms After completeing professional exam

name: Complete HSRD form with advisor
description: discuss any other approvals (feasibility committee, data use, etc.} https://u.osu.edu/dnpnursinghandbook2020/human-subjects-research-determination-procedures  After completing professional exam

name: Apply to graduate in Gradforms
description: https://gradforms.osu.edu/ One term prior to graduation

name: Committee informal meeting
description: This is good for practice, but not required Prior to final defense

name: Complete DNP Final Project Defense
description: Committee members sign approval in Gradforms https://gradsch.osu.edu/calendar/graduation   By deadline of term of graduation

name: Clinical Question Approval
description: Submit your clinical question to your advisor for approval.
